name: SCRIBBLE tablecloth
description: The SCRIBBLE textile collection by Sylvain Willenz consists of 4 different patterns with distinctive Finnish names. Each pattern is deliberately simple, as if hand-drawn by a child, combined with elegance in style and great craftsmanship in production. Designed for One Nordic Furniture Company (FI) Year of design 2013 Materials 55% Linen and 45% Cotton Technique Silkscreen print on textile or jacquard knit Dimensions S: 144 x 144 cm / M: 144 x 200 cm / L: 144 x 250 cm Various sizes and colour options available 1. Kuutio (jacquard knit) 2. Kenno White EUROPE _ships direct from SWS OTHER DESTINATIONS _please Contact us to order

name: TORCH table light

Inspired by the typical torch and car headlight, the soft grainy plastic and tactile finish makes it a perfect ambient light. name: DROP bucket
description: DROP is a simple and affordable injection moulded plastic bucket inspired by normality and basic objects of every day life. The design of DROP is inspired by qualities that were found throughout research in archetypal buckets and the production of plastic household products. DROP’s design is elegant with well-proportioned lines; its colour range is thoughtfully and clearly defined; Blue, yellow and green with a red handle. A texture on the outer surface of the bucket suggests small evaporating bubbles of water and offers an extra grip to its user. Designed for Xala (BE) Made in Belgium Year of design 2013 Materials LDPE / plastic Dimensions H30cm Ø30cm Capacity 13L 3 colourways Blue, Yellow, Green EUROPE _ships direct from SWS OTHER DESTINATIONS _please Contact us to order

name: PIFF wall-hooks
description: PIFF is a family of 3 versatile wall-hooks made from ash wood and bakelite beads. Each wall-hook, made to the highest standards, is machine-drilled and hand assembled in Brussels. There is no use of glue; only pressure has been used to assemble all parts together. PIFF wall-hooks are ideal for anywhere around the house where you want to hang your clothes, jackets, bags, keys, etc. and will add a few spots of joyful colour to your walls. Very easy to mount to the wall. Each PIFF comes with a special strong screw and a wall-plug. Each box contains a SET of 3 PIFFs (1 SMALL single bead, 1 MEDIUM-double-bead and 1 LARGE-double-bead) Designed for Tamawa (BE) Made in Belgium Year of design 2012 Materials Ash and Bakelite Dimensions Variable / Longest PIFF is L 14cm Four colourways 1. Full Red 2. Orange purple mix 3. Pink Blue mix 4. Full Black WORLDWIDE _ships direct from SWS

name: RING mirror
description: RING mirror plays with the strength of form and graphic simplicity, creating a strong and super graphic feature in all interiors. Although its unusually thick border and a the small silvered area, RING works perfectly well as a mirror for everyday use. Surprisingly, one’s face is well framed and visible in the silver area from very close up, or even from a distance. The technical beauty of this mirror lies in that both the silvering and the colour are applied to the back of the glass, hence the reflection also in the black border. Hand crafted in Brussels with utmost skill from a single sheet of 6mm glass. RING is fully fitted with secure and easy to install wall fasteners. Produced by Sylvain Willenz (BE) Made in Belgium Year of design 2011 Materials Hand crafted mirror Dimensions 50 cm Diameter 2 colourways Black or Classic Red EUROPE _ships direct from SWS OTHER DESTINATIONS _please Contact us to order

name: HOMERUN hooks
description: Inspired from old cartoons, and part of the HOMERUN series, HOMERUN hooks are characterised by bold and rounded features that have been rationalized to classic simplicity and elegance. It combines the charm of a deliberate naivety with perfect workmanship. Very easy to mount to the wall. Each HOMERUN hook comes with a special strong screw and a wall-plug. Each box contains a SET of 2 HOMERUN hooks. (1 small, 1 big) Designed for Karimoku New Standard (JP) Year of design 2011 Materials Japanese Oak Dimensions W50 x D50 x H85 / W60 x D60 x H110 Colourways Yellow stained, Natural WORLDWIDE _ships direct from SWS

name: PROFILE chair
description: PROFILE chair is a super lightweight and comfortable chair with surprising inner workings. It consists almost entirely of natural fibre, thin wood veneer and air! Thanks to the use of very lightweight natural fibre composite hollow tubes, a delicate construction was achieved. The tubes are made with a high-tech process that is also used in the manufacture of sports equipment, such as fishing rods. The chair is almost entirely hollow; only the points of intersection of the structure are reinforced by connectors made of solid wood and aluminium to give the chair maximum sturdiness. The tubes are sheathed with a very thin ash veneer and capped with feet made of natural rubber. In spite of its technically sophisticated and innovative construction, PROFILE is simple, consisting of thoughtfully pure and minimal lines, portraying a strong yet comforting character. PROFILE is stackable and suited to home or collectivity uses, available in 6 colour ways. Designed for Stattmann Neue Moebel (DE) Year of design 2012 Made in Germany Materials Hollow compressed Cotton tubing and laminate Dimensions H80 x W34 x D46 5 colourways Anthracite Grey, Pink, Burgundy, White, Natural EUROPE _ships direct from SWS OTHER DESTINATIONS _please Contact us to order

name: LOCK coat-stand
description: LOCK is an simple and effective solution to the archetypal coat-stand. A sturdy Belgian-made classic design that will fit all interiors. 3 sticks, 1 ball, 1 invisible screw. LOCK owes its uniqueness to the simplicity of its elements and how they are cleverly put together using an internal engineered system. All elements are held together using 1 invisible screw. Designed for Tamawa (BE) Made in Belgium Year of design 2010 Materials Ash and machined Bakelite Dimensions H165cm   Floor Spread 65x65x65cm Note Shipped in compact box / Easy to assemble 7 colourways (Ball options) Yellow, orange, red, fuschia, purple, blue, black EUROPE _ships direct from SWS OTHER DESTINATIONS _please Contact us to order

name: LOCK kids coat-stand
description: This one is for the kids :-) LOCK KIDS is the small version of LOCK and is simple and effective solution to the archetypal coat-stand. A sturdy Belgian-made classic design that will fit all interiors. 3 sticks, 1 ball, 1 invisible screw. LOCK owes its uniqueness to the simplicity of its elements and how they are cleverly put together using an internal engineered system. All elements are held together using 1 invisible screw. Designed for Tamawa (BE) Made in Belgium Year of design 2010 Materials Ash and machined Bakelite Dimensions H165cm   Floor Spread 50x50x50cm Note Shipped in compact box / Easy to assemble 7 Colour ways (Ball options) Yellow, orange, red, fuschia, purple, blue, black EUROPE _ships direct from SWS OTHER DESTINATIONS _please Contact us to order

name: STUFF rubber bag
description: STUFF is a seamless flat handbag made from natural rubber. A cool accessory, stretchable, super-resistant and washable, STUFF can contain anything and everything. And for the more organized minds STUFF can be used as a document holder thanks to its A4 format. STUFF is also a perfect gift for those eco-minded friends in need of an alternative to plastic shopping bags. Produced by SYLVAIN WILLENZ   Made in the UK Year of design 2007 Material 100% Natural Rubber   Dimensions 36 x 27 x 0.5 cm   3 Colourways Black, Green, Blue WORLDWIDE _ships direct from SWS

name: GLASSWORKS catalogue
description: Glassworks is the exhibition catalogue documenting Sylvain Willenz’s research carried out during his residency from 2009 to 2012 at CIRVA, The International Glass and Visual Arts Research Centre of Marseille, France. The catalogue follows the development of three main projects; SHIFT, a blown glass side-table, SPOT a light in four flavors, and BLOCK, a series of cast containers, all produced by Victor Hunt Designart Dealer, Belgium. Glassworks comprises specifically written texts, photography by Sylvain Willenz, documenting research, experiments, technical drawings and development sketches as well as an exclusive photo shoot of the final pieces. Authors: Isabelle Reiher, Director of CIRVA; Christelle Notelet, Workshop manager of CIRVA, Sylvain Willenz and Victor Hunt. Publisher Victor Hunt Designart Dealer Design Theophile’s Papers et Shelter Press Printed in Belgium, 2012 Paperback, 80 pages in B&W and Color, 160x230mm, 300g First Edition of 1000 WORLDWIDE _ships direct from SWS

name: STUFF SPLASH bag
description: The STUFF SPLASH was created exclusively for SWS as an addition to the STUFF BAGS range. Drops of coloured natural rubber have been splashed on the bags during the making process. STUFF SPLASH is a seamless and flat rubber handbag. Stretchable, super-resistant and washable, STUFF SPLASH can contain anything and everything. And for the more organized minds STUFF SPLASH can be used as a document holder thanks to its A4 format. A perfect gift, it is also a friendly alternative to plastic bags for your shopping. Produced by SYLVAIN WILLENZ   Made in the UK Year of design 2011 Material 100% Natural Rubber   Dimensions 36 x 27 x 0.5 cm   2 Colourways available Black Bag with Blue, Red and Yellow spashes or Black Bag with White splashes WORLDWIDE _ships direct from SWS

name: HOMERUN paperweight
description: Produced in Japan to the highest quality standards, with its playful character and its soft features, the bold cartoon ink-stamp-looking paperweight will stand proudly on your desk. An addition to Sylvain's HOMERUN furniture series, the HOMERUN Paperweight will suit all desktop preferences. Designed for Karimoku Furniture Inc. for KARIMOKU NEW STANDARD (JP)   Made in Japan Year of design 2011 Materials Japanese Oak  Dimensions H13 x L8 x D11 cm 3 colourways Natural, stained Yellow stained White. Credit 3d Photo: Rita Platts for Disegno No.4 WORLDWIDE _ships direct from SWS

name: LOOP mirror
description: LOOP mirror plays with the strength of form and graphic simplicity, creating a strong and super graphic feature in all interiors. Although an unusually thick border and a narrow silvered area, Loop function perfectly as a mirror. Surprisingly, one’s upper body is well framed and visible in the silver area from close up, or even from a distance. The technical beauty of this mirror lies in that both the silvering and the colour are applied to the back of the glass, hence the reflection also in the black border. Hand crafted in Brussels with utmost skill from a single sheet of 6mm glass. LOOP Mirror is fully fitted with secure and easy to install wall fasteners. Produced by Sylvain Willenz (BE) Made in Belgium Year of design 2011 Materials Hand crafted mirror Dimensions 70x50cm 2 colourways Black or Classic Red EUROPE _ships direct from SWS OTHER DESTINATIONS _please Contact us to order

name: SLIDE mirror
description: The SLIDE Mirrors are based on a simple graphic drawing, which plays with reflection, perception and depth. The black border clearly refers to simple and fat graffiti drop-shadows and the most elementary 3D effects. The feature is applied with the finest mirroring techniques on the back of a single sheet of glass. Hand crafted in Brussels with utmost skill from a single sheet of 4mm glass. SLIDE Mirror is fully fitted with secure and easy to install wall fasteners. Produced by SYLVAIN WILLENZ Made in Belgium  Year of design 2007 Materials Glass Dimensions Tall full standing 145x52cm Medium 107x52 cm Small Rectangular 62x47cm Square 67x67cm Colors Mirror silvering + Black on backside of glass EUROPE _ships direct from SWS OTHER DESTINATIONS _please Contact us to order

name: RAY light
description: RAY Light suspension for Tamawa investigates the common use and typology of Tubular Lighting (TL), a light source, which is usually found in crude and low-tech designs for non-domestic situations. RAY makes use of specialized production techniques, expertise and understanding for the machining of Bakelite balls, consequently creating a domestic lighting fixture with a refined technical solution. RAY is an original and colourful alternative to common TL connectors. Designed for Tamawa (BE) Made in Belgium Year of design 2012 Materials Bakelite / TL and electronics Note Dimmable with a remote control Dimensions Variable / Longest PIFF is L 14cm Colourways full black, full red or bespoke colour mixes EUROPE _ships direct from SWS OTHER DESTINATIONS _please Contact us to order

name: LANDMARKS lights _on order
description: This series of lights is inspired by outdoor functional devices designed to be seen from the sky. The LANDMARK Roof light is inspired by signs found along roads which usually indicate milage and underground gas conduct trails. The LANDMARK Cone light takes its shape from the well known windsock, a simple textile tube on a pole, used to indicate the direction of the wind. In low winds the wind sock droops and in high wind it floats horizontally, hence the fully articulated head of the light. Designed for Established & Sons (UK) Year of design 2009 Materials Steel, Polycarbonate and rubber Dimensions Tall: 175cm, Reading: 125cm, Table: 38cm Colourways Orange RAL 2004 + Grey RAL 7038 Or Black soft-touch finish (only available for Landmark Cone) Prices excl. VAT Table version with Cone shade € 530,00 Table version with Roof shade € 560,00 Floor version with Cone shade € 670,00 -25% Discount on this collection

name: PRINT lamp _on order
description: PRINT lamp gathers within a single bubble of blown glass, the components usually found as separate items in pendant lighting. In effect, the shade, the colour, the reflector and the diffuser have all been produced throughout one and sole gesture. Only the light fitting is added in a second phase of production. This logic and attention to process, applied to a carefully and well-proportioned flat globe, offers a bright reinterpretation of an archetypal globe light. Designed for Established & Sons (UK) Year of design 2010 Materials Glass Dimensions Ø40cm Finishes 1. Grey Etched 2. White Etched 3. Grey Gradated Natural 4. White Gradated Natural Prices excl. VAT All finishes € 960,00
